revised_title: A Study of Skull, Mandible, and Milk Dentition of Palaeomastodon with Remarks on Tooth Change in Proboscidea
tldr: The author examines the skull, mandible, and milk dentition of Palaeomastodon, focusing on the structure of the zygomatic arch and the form of the premaxilla. The study provides insights into the tooth change in the Proboscidea group and contributes to the understanding of the evolution of this species.
